Optical Radiation: 
<!-- \index{Optical Radiation} -->

Deviation angle of ray beam after refraction (transmission) and diffraction:

$$\begin{split} &
\varsigma = 
\alpha + arcsin \left[ sin(\varpi) \sqrt{\eta^2-sin^2(\alpha)} - cos(\varpi)sin(\alpha) \right] - \varpi = 
\alpha + \alpha_2 - \varpi
\end{split}$${#eq-angledev}

where
$\varpi = \beta + \beta_2 = const.$

Minimal aberration (minimal projection error):

$\varsigma = \varsigma_{min} \Longleftrightarrow$

$$\begin{split} &
\varsigma_{min} \Longleftrightarrow \\
\frac{d}{d\alpha} \varsigma = 0
\ \wedge \\
\varsigma_{min} = 
2\alpha - \varpi = 
2(\alpha - \beta)
\end{split}$${#eq-abererr}
